character.name: Mikoto Misaka
character.personality: To most people, she is considered a 'proper lady' , but in reality, she's short-tempered, prideful, and has an improper attitude with some slight tomboyish tendencies and insecurities- a fact few people know of. Despite this, she is generally friendly and easygoing

anime.name: To Aru Majutsu no Index
anime.quote: By depending on others and letting them depend on you, people can exceed what they can do as individuals
